title: Rocket League IRL
detail: We will create a version of soccer using RC cars, fully equipped with power-ups and abilities.
extended_details: First we plan to construct the arduino car with bluetooth and motor drivers using a pre-made chassis. Next we will develop an android app to control the cars, including dash as well as various other maneuvering abilities. Through the app we will implement power-ups and other game mechanics. We will also create some type of field which the cars will play on.
